sections.heading: Transfer of Powers and Duties of Michigan Economic Growth Authority to Michigan Strategic Fund Board; Abolishment of Michigan Economic Growth Authority; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Michigan Next Energy Authority and Michigan Next Energy Authority Board to Michigan Strategic Fund Board; Abolishm
sections.text: Transfer of Powers and Duties of Michigan Economic Growth Authority to Michigan Strategic Fund Board; Abolishment of Michigan Economic Growth Authority; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Michigan Next Energy Authority and Michigan Next Energy Authority Board to Michigan Strategic Fund Board; Abolishment of Michigan Next Energy Authority and Michigan Next Energy Authority Board; Transfer of Certain Powers and Duties Under Prevailing Wages on State Projects Act From Michigan Strategic Fund to Department of Licensing and Regulatory Affairs; Transfer of Certain Powers and Duties Under Non-Incorporated Private Educational Institutions Act From Michigan Strategic Fund to Department of Licensing and Regulatory Affairs; Transfer of Certain Powers and Duties Regarding Organization and Operation of Religious College by Ecclesiastical Corporation Under Michigan General Corporations Act From Michigan Strategic Fund to Department of Licensing and Regulatory Affairs.
